meanings.definition: The act of abutting or the state of being abutted.
meanings.sent1: The abuttal of the two properties created a shared boundary.
meanings.sent2: The abuttal of the fence against the wall was well done.
meanings.sent3: The abuttal of the puzzle pieces made completing it easier.
meanings.sent4: The abuttal of ideas in the meeting led to a productive discussion.
meanings.sent5: The abuttal of the two rivers formed a beautiful natural border.

meanings.definition: A structure that abuts, especially a building that abuts on land.
meanings.sent1: The old abuttal had a charming rustic look.
meanings.sent2: The new abuttal was built right next to the park.
meanings.sent3: The tiny abuttal looked like a miniature house.
meanings.sent4: The abuttal of the skyscraper against the sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The historic abuttal stood out among the modern buildings.
